name: Reminisce
description:
There's a pesky ghost haunting your house and stealing your things! Aim your magic to keep the ghost at bay, but don't despair if you lose some things. Taking a moment to reminisce on your precious possessions might just bring them back to reality.

Assets used:

Footsteps and Door sounds - 44.1 General Library (InspectorJ Sound Affects)

Firing and Ghost sounds - Free Sound Effects Pack (Olivier Girardot)

Menu sounds - Minimal UI Sounds (cabled_mess)

Character Model - Low Poly Skeleton (asoliddev)

Furniture - Bed & Bath Furniture (PepperJack), HDRP Furniture Pack (Tridify), Toon Furniture (Elcanetay), Tim's Assets (Tim H.)

Framed Pictures - Frames With Pictures (3Dfrk)

Wooden Textures - Wooden Floor Materials (Casual2D)

Brick and Tile Textures - Textures - Brick and Tile (Mixaill)

Background/skybox and nature models - Hand Painted Nature Kit LITE (SkythianCat)

Run, Idle and Shoot animations - Warrior Pack Bundle 2 FREE (Explosive)

Run backwards animation - Basic Motions Pack (Kevin Iglesias)

Pant, sprint, sit up/down, handshake animations - Everyday Motion Pack FREE (Gizmozman)
